params.812: Reach level 5 in the Magic skill.
params.813: Ensure you have runes for a spell you can cast at your Magic level. The Men, Chickens and Goblins near Lumbridge are suitable targets to fight.
params.814: Train your Magic to level 5 by fighting nearby monsters!|Make sure to equip your robes and staff.|Ensure you have a spell set that you can use and have the runes for.|If you run out of runes, speak to the magic instructor south of the general store in Lumbridge.|Take some food to keep your hitpoints high.|The Men, Chickens and Goblins near Lumbridge are suitable targets to fight.|Chickens drop Raw chicken which can be cooked and used as food.|You can bury bones to gain Prayer experience.
params.823: Ensure you have runes for a Magic spell which you can use.
